mapper.update: update seller set seller_name = #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remaker_score = #{remakerScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `disable` = #{disable,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select seller_id, seller_name, remaker_score, create_date, update_date, `disable` from seller order by seller_id asc
